name: Floowandereeze and the Scary Sea
text: When your opponent would Special Summon a monster(s) while you control a face-up Tribute Summoned monster and no Special Summoned monsters: Your opponent cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, but they can conduct 3 Normal Summons/Sets this turn, not just 1, also negate the Summon, and if you do, return that monster(s) to the hand. You can only activate 1 "Floowandereeze and the Scary Sea" per turn.
